Package Combat

Class DamageHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • Combat.DamageHandler
  • public class DamageHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used for calculating damage.

      • tryDodge

        public boolean tryDodge()
        Attempts to dodge an attack.
        Returns:
        Returns true if dodge was successful or false when unsuccessful.

      • tryCrit

        public boolean tryCrit()
        Attempts to deal critical damage.
        Returns:
        Returns true if critical attack was successful or false when unsuccessful.

      • calcCritDmg

        public int calcCritDmg​(int dmg)
        Multiplies damage with critical modifier.
        Parameters:
        dmg - Damage that is modified.
        Returns:
        Returns critical damage.

      • calcPhysDmg

        public int calcPhysDmg​(Weapon myWeapon,
                       int lowPhysDmg,
                       int highPhysDmg)
        Calculates physical damage.
        Parameters:
        myWeapon - Weapon used for attacking.
        lowPhysDmg - Lower bound of base physical damage.
        highPhysDmg - Higher bound of base physical damage.
        Returns:
        Returns physical damage.

        Calculates piercing damage.
        Parameters:
        myWeapon - Weapon used for attacking.
        lowPiercDmg - Lower bound of base piercing damage.
        highPiercDmg - Higher bound of base piercing damage.
        Returns:
        Returns piercing damage.

        Increases damage with strength attribute.
        Parameters:
        str - Player strength.
        dmg - Player physical damage.
        Returns:

      • applyDex

        public int applyDex​(int dex,

        Increases damage with dexterity attribute.
        Parameters:

        dmg - Player piercing damage.

      • absorbDmg

        public int absorbDmg​(Armor myArmor,
                     int baseArmor,
                     int dmg)
        Absorbs physical damage with armor.
        Parameters:
        myArmor - Armor used to absorb damage.
        baseArmor - Base armor of receiver.
        dmg - Physical damage dealt by attacker.
        Returns:
        Returns decreased physical damage.
